column4: I want to watch embedded DivX movies (in Firefox) on Feisty. I've tried VLC and MPlayer (both of which say they support DivX) with the relevant browser plugins, but it still won't work. I'm talking about the "Stage 6" website
on whatever machine, just set the gateway to the ubuntu machine
system > admin > network, there you could edit a connection and fill inthings like the gateway and ip etc.
